title: OnlineLibrary
technologies: C#, ASP.NET Core MVC, SQL Server
description: A simple online library that allows users to manage books and categories. It includes login and signup functionality, enabling users to borrow and return books seamlessly.

title: ReactBeans
technologies: React JS, Vite, Jelly Belly Wiki API
description: This project is a React application built with Vite that allows users to explore and view beans and recipes from the Jelly Belly Wiki API.

title: StudentGig
description: StudentGig is a platform designed to connect college students with short-term, flexible gig opportunities.

title: Book n' Map
description: Book n' Map is a community-driven platform designed to help users discover and share quiet spaces (e.g., libraries).

title: E-Commerce Website
description: A website that can assist mall owners in managing different stalls or businesses that are registered.

title: Minesweep: Java Edition
description: Minesweeper game with a leaderboard, saving of data, and increasing difficulty of levels.

title: Lexical, Syntax, and Semantic Analyzer
description: This application has a simple code editor and a made-up programming language to use. Also, it consists of the first three phases of compiler.

title: Brave Knight: An ASCII Art Adventure
description: A 2D turn-based strategy game wherein the knight needs to conquer a tower full of monsters.

title: Public Bubble (Design Prototype)
description: This is the concept design for a mobile application that will track and manage all types of public vehicles.
